variables.name: Discord bot key
variables.description: Key for discord bot that will be used for updating online information

variables.name: Discord user ID
variables.description:
User for which to check online status. This should be discord snowflake id.
You can get it by enabling developer mode in discord and right clicking on a user.

variables.name: Steam name
variables.description: Steam name to be used to check current game and online status

variables.name: FFXIV character ID
variables.description:
To get this id, search your character on lodestone https://na.finalfantasyxiv.com/lodestone/character/ .
After clicking on your character, the last part of the url is your character id.
